name: Adfection
description:
You're a sentient computer virus aiming to defeat the OS and cause the Blue Screen of Death!

Run into the OS to damage it. If you don't have enough segments, your attack will harmlessly bounce off its shield, so keep eating files to become stronger!

The OS will send antivirus robots after you, which you can thwart by placing popup ads that will destroy them on contact.

Use WASD to move, Space to place an ad, and R to reset.
